newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Ocean County, N.J., $44 mln.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Ocean County, N.J., $44 mln.

text.p: SEALED OR TELECOPIED PROPOSALS will be received, publicly opened and announced by the Comptroller of the County of Ocean (the County''

until 11:00 a.m., for the purchase of the $43,737,000 Bond Anticipation Notes, Series 1997 of the County dated June 19, 1997 and maturing on June 19, 1998. All bidders for the Notes must be participants of The Depository Trust Company, New York, New York (DTC''), or affiliated with its participants. Individual purchases may be made in the principal amount of $1,000 or any multiple thereof through book entries made on the books and records of DTC and its participants. The Notes will be delivered on or about June 19, 1997 at the offices of the County's bond counsel, DeCotiis, FitzPatrick & Gluck, in Toms River, New Jersey. The Notes will be dated June 19, 1997 and will bear interest at the rate of interest per annum specified by the successful bidder and the rate named must be a multiple of 1/8 or 1/20 of 1%. The Notes are not subject to redemption prior to maturity. The Notes will be awarded to the bidder on whose bid the total loan may be made at the lowest net interest cost, in accordance with the terms of the sale. A complete Notice of Sale containing the full terms of sale and the Preliminary Official Statement have each been prepared and may be obtained from the County's financial advisor, Altman & Co., 11 Pinewood Court, Short Hills, NJ 07078 (201/376-8916) Attention: Vivian Altman.
